comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Dan Flynn (April 5, 1888 – 1946) was an American boxer known for his punch and dirty tactics, earning him the nickname "Porky". He had a record of 26 wins (6 by knockout), 22 losses, 8 draws, and 36 no decisions. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dan_Flynn_(boxer)
